sentences.en: A single tree in a field is prominent.
sentences.cn: 田地里一棵孤零零的树是很显眼的.

sentences.en: About 10 years ago, I went to a Q & A session with a prominent politician.
sentences.cn: 大约10年前，我和一名政界要人一起参加了一场问答节目。

sentences.en: Arthritis and rheumatism are prominent crippling diseases.
sentences.cn: 关节炎和风湿病是会严重损害身体健康的主要疾病。

sentences.en: Each year they compete in a prominent statewide bicycle race.
sentences.cn: 每年他们都要参加著名的全州自行车大赛。
他是位著名的(内科)医生.
他是科学界杰出的人物.

sentences.en: He played a prominent part in the campaign.
sentences.cn: 他在这次运动中发挥了重要作用。

sentences.en: He was dismissed for publicly insulting prominent politicians.
sentences.cn: 他在大庭广众之下辱骂政坛显贵,结果被撤职了.

sentences.en: His stomach had grown more prominent with every passing year.
sentences.cn: 他的肚子一年比一年鼓。

sentences.en: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
sentences.cn: 花园里，苹果树和梨树患枯枝病最明显。

sentences.en: Note the statue to Sallustio Bandini, a prominent Sienese.
sentences.cn: 请看这座萨卢斯蒂奥·班迪尼的雕像，他是一位杰出的锡耶纳人。

sentences.en: That school is prominent in baseball.
The brown rat has prominent ears and a long scaly tail.
sentences.cn: 那只棕鼠两只耳朵向前支着，一条长尾巴布满鳞片。

sentences.en: The Catholic Church has played a prominent role throughout Polish history.
sentences.cn: 天主教会在整个波兰历史上曾发挥过举足轻重的作用。

sentences.en: The newspapers gave prominent coverage to the news.
sentences.cn: 各报在显著位置上登载了这条消息.

sentences.en: The World Cup will have a prominent place on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 世界杯赛将占据议程表的重要位置。

trans.tran_cn: 突出的，杰出的，突起的，著名的
